edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.packet

Class BasicPacketWithClientAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.packet.BasicPacket
      • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.packet.BasicPacketWithClientAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtensiblePacketInterface, PacketInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminResponsePacket, BasicPacketWithNs, BasicPacketWithReturnAddress, BasicPacketWithSignatureInfo, CommandPacket, ResponsePacket, SentinalPacket, StopPacket

    public abstract class BasicPacketWithClientAddress
extends BasicPacket
    Provides the basics for Packets including a type field. Includes support for maintaining a clientAddress field using MessageNIOTransport.getSenderAddress.
    Author:
    westy
